name: SHRI SADGURU SEWA SANGH TRUST
briefDescription: SHRI SADGURU SEVA SANGH TRUST (SSSST) is a registered public charitable Trust, founded by Param Pujya Shri Ranchchoddasji Maharaj (Gurudev) in the early 1950â€™s & formalized into a Trust in 1968 in Dhar, Indore, State of Madhya Pradesh in India. The primary activities of the trust is EYE CARE i.e. Eradication of Blindness.  We are one of the largest NGO in Northern part of Central India, to provide free eye care service  to the rural people, which have an access to almost 700,000 people & performs 1,50,000 surgeries every year. We also focus on Health, Education, Women Empowerment, Dairy Development & Cattle Care, Agriculture & various other Social Activities.
